diff_hunk:
@@ -59,6 +60,37 @@ class DataLoader {
     }
   }
 
+  /// Constructs a new `DataLoader` from a `dataset`, `options`, and `Sampler`.
+  /// This constructor must be used with a chunk data set. The `Sampler` is
+  /// default to `BatchSizeSampler` for the dataloader, please check
+  /// `make_chunk_data_loader` below. However, a regular sampler and a chunk
+  /// sampler need to be provided to the `dataset` for it to function properly.
+  /// The data loader simply retrives batches using the batch size.
+  DataLoader(
+      Dataset dataset,
body: If this DataLoader class only works with ChunkDataSet, does it make sense to change this constructor input parameter to be an explicit ChunkDataSet. So mis-use of this class can be flagged during compilation.
body_html: If this DataLoader class only works with ChunkDataSet, does it make sense to change this constructor input parameter to be an explicit ChunkDataSet. So mis-use of this class can be flagged during compilation.
